full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Audiovisual Equipment and Installation

### Tender Details
* Tender Reference Number: [WS4040648285 - Doc4056681084](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17106013?extsite=MTcxMDYwMTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* Solicitation Number: [WS4040648285](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17106013?extsite=MTcxMDYwMTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* Publication Date: August 8, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: October 2, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST

### Service Requirement
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (GAC) invites bids for the supply, installation, and integration of a fully functional audiovisual (AV) system as part of a space modernization project of GAC's offices located in Ottawa, ON. The AV system will be installed in a secure environment and must meet the project's security requirements.

### Contract Terms
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Procurement Method: Competitive Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: This tender is subject to the Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP).

### Contracting Entity
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

### Contact Information
Alexandra Nadeau (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: alexandra.nadeau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Mandatory Site Visit
A mandatory site visit is scheduled to take place on August 25, 2023. Requests to attend must be submitted by August 18, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST to the Contracting Authority.  Enjoy your revisions!



### Estimated Contract Duration
A non-disclosed schedule of values is provided in the solicitation document.
